√bhuj1 'bend'

present: [6.] bhujáti etc. V.+  

perfect: bubhoja  ábubhojīs  

[aorist: abhaukṣīt  bhokṣyati  bhoktā  ]

verbal: bhugna S.+  -bhujya S.+  

secondary: passive: bhujyate  

derivatives: -bhuj  bhuja E.+  bhogá V.+  bhují RV.  bhujmán? RV.  bhujyú V.B.
